review: I had severe abdominal pain during and after the cycle past 3 years. Last 3 months the pain was unbearable. We were praying and asking God to help us. God directed us to Dr. Regina. She would definitely respond in times when we are unable to go and meet her in the clinic. Very understanding. We as a family would like to thank God for Dr. Regina.
